query.statement:
MERGE INTO SAPHEE.ZCST950N AS A USING ( SELECT BSU ,COUNT(A.PJT) AS RNQ
,SUM(CASE WHEN A.KND <> '' AND A.KND_B = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) RNQ_PTF ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.KND = '' AND A.KND_B <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) RNQ_FTP ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.KND = '' AND A.KND_B = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) RNQ_PTP ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.KND <> '' AND A.KND_B <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) RNQ_FTF ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.KND = '' AND A.KND_B = '' AND A.AMT > A.AMT_B THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) RNQ_PTPU ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.KND = '' AND A.KND_B = '' AND A.AMT < A.AMT_B THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) RNQ_PTPD ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.KND = '' AND A.KND_B = '' AND A.AMT > A.AMT_B THEN (A.AMT - A.AMT_B) ELSE 0 END ) RNQ_PTPUA ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.KND = '' AND A.KND_B = '' AND A.AMT < A.AMT_B THEN (A.AMT_B - A.AMT) ELSE 0 END ) RNQ_PTPDA ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.KND = '' AND A.KND_B = '' THEN A.AMT ELSE 0 END ) PTPA ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.KND <> '' AND A.KND_B <> '' AND A.AMT > A.AMT_B THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) RNQ_FTFU ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.KND <> '' AND A.KND_B <> '' AND A.AMT < A.AMT_B THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) RNQ_FTFD ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.KND <> '' AND A.KND_B <> '' AND A.AMT > A.AMT_B THEN (A.AMT - A.AMT_B) ELSE 0 END ) RNQ_FTFUA ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.KND <> '' AND A.KND_B <> '' AND A.AMT < A.AMT_B THEN (A.AMT_B - A.AMT) ELSE 0 END ) RNQ_FTFDA ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.KND <> '' AND A.KND_B <> '' THEN A.AMT ELSE 0 END ) FTFA ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.HYN = 'Y' AND A.KND = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) RNQ_PRTS ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.HYN = 'Y' AND A.KND <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) RNQ_FRTS ,SUM(CASE WHEN SAPHEE.MONTH_BETWEEN( A.UMR_B , A.GDATE ,'1') < 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) RNQ_1
FROM (
SELECT A.PJT ,A.HNO ,A.GNO ,A.GDATE
,CASE WHEN A.GDATE <= A.IKD THEN C.CS157_CAB WHEN A.GDATE > A.IKD THEN C.CS157_CAA ELSE A.ARA END ARA ,CASE WHEN A.GDATE <= A.IKD THEN C.CS157_CHB WHEN A.GDATE > A.IKD THEN C.CS157_CHA ELSE A.BSU END BSU
,A.KND ,A.HYN ,A.AMT ,A.UMR ,VALUE(D.CS126_KND,'') KND_B ,VALUE(D.CS126_HYN,'') HYN_B ,VALUE(D.CS126_AMT, 0) AMT_B ,VALUE(D.CS126_UMR,'') UMR_B
FROM ( SELECT CS126_PJT PJT ,CS126_HNO HNO ,CS126_GNO GNO ,MIN(CS126_USD) USD ,MIN(CS126_ADT) ADT ,MAX(CS126_UHJ) UHJ ,MAX(CS126_UMR) UMR
,CASE WHEN MIN(CS126_ADT) > MIN(CS126_USD) THEN MIN(CS126_ADT) ELSE MIN(CS126_USD) END GDATE ,MAX(CS126_KND) KND ,MAX(CS126_HYN) HYN ,MAX(CS126_AMT) AMT ,MIN(B.CS157_IKD) IKD ,MAX(A.CS126_ARA) ARA ,MAX(A.CS126_BSU) BSU ,(SELECT CS126_UMR FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS126_DDT = '' AND CS126_PST = 'A6' AND CS126_GND = 'D' AND CS126_PJT = A.CS126_PJT AND CS126_HNO = A.CS126_HNO AND CS126_UMR < MAX(A.CS126_UMR) ORDER BY CS126_UMR DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) UMR_B
FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST157 B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS126_PJT = B.CS157_PJT AND A.CS126_HNO = B.CS157_HNO AND B.CS157_IKD > A.CS126_ADT AND B.CS157_GND = 'D'
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS126_DDT = '' AND A.CS126_GND = 'D' AND A.CS126_GKD = '2' AND A.CS126_SLA = 'N' AND SUBSTR(A.CS126_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W','C')
AND A.CS126_USD >= '20170101' AND CASE WHEN substr(CS126_ADT,1,6) >= substr(CS126_UGS,1,6) THEN CS126_ADT ELSE CS126_UGS END BETWEEN SUBSTR(#GDATE# ,1,6)||'01' AND #GDATE#
AND CASE WHEN substr(CS126_ADT,1,6) >= substr(CS126_USD,1,6) THEN CS126_ADT ELSE CS126_USD END BETWEEN SUBSTR(#GDATE# ,1,6)||'01' AND #GDATE#
GROUP BY CS126_PJT,CS126_HNO,CS126_GNO,CS126_SEQ
) A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST111 B ON B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PJT = B.PJT AND A.HNO = B.HNO AND B.EXC = ''
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST157 C ON C.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PJT = C.CS157_PJT AND A.HNO = C.CS157_HNO AND A.IKD = C.CS157_IKD AND C.CS157_GND = 'D'
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST126 D ON D.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PJT = D.CS126_PJT AND A.HNO = D.CS126_HNO AND A.UMR_B = D.CS126_UMR AND D.CS126_DDT = '' AND D.CS126_PST = 'A6' ) AS A
GROUP BY BSU
) AS B ON A.BSU = B.BSU AND A.YYYYMM = #YYYYMM# AND A.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
WHEN MATCHED THEN
UPDATE SET RNQ = B.RNQ ,RNQ_PTF = B.RNQ_PTF ,RNQ_FTP = B.RNQ_FTP ,RNQ_PTP = B.RNQ_PTP ,RNQ_FTF = B.RNQ_FTF ,RNQ_PTPU = B.RNQ_PTPU ,RNQ_PTPD = B.RNQ_PTPD ,RNQ_PTPUA = B.RNQ_PTPUA ,RNQ_PTPDA = B.RNQ_PTPDA ,PTPA = B.PTPA ,RNQ_FTFU = B.RNQ_FTFU ,RNQ_FTFD = B.RNQ_FTFD ,RNQ_FTFUA = B.RNQ_FTFUA ,RNQ_FTFDA = B.RNQ_FTFDA ,FTFA = B.FTFA ,RNQ_PRTS = B.RNQ_PRTS ,RNQ_FRTS = B.RNQ_FRTS ,RNQ_1 = B.RNQ_1
